Class Deluxe

java.lang.Object
com.example.rupizzeria.Pizza
com.example.rupizzeria.Deluxe
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class Deluxe extends Pizza
Represents a deluxe pizza. Extends the Pizza abstract Class.
